price: 8. Ya soló, wana ezali elembo. Kasi ebele kati na bango bazali kondima te.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
